keywords: Key players agentic AI in FinTech
strategy: The DeepCrawlerAgent will focus on identifying the intensity of competition within the FinTech blockchain sector, with a specific emphasis on the integration and impact of agentic AI. The strategy involves leveraging the provided keywords to scour financial news outlets, industry reports, company press releases, and investment databases for information on major competitors, their market shares, recent mergers and acquisitions (M&A), strategic partnerships, and pricing models. The agent will prioritize data from the last 6-12 months to capture the most current competitive dynamics. It will identify emerging threats from agile startups and strategic shifts by established players, analyzing product differentiation and technological advancements, particularly those driven by agentic AI capabilities.
recommended_apis: Financial News APIs (e.g., Bloomberg/Refinitiv data feeds for M&A news and market data)
